servers.name: io.github.UI5/mcp
servers.description: MCP server for UI5 application development

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: A comma-separated list of domains that are allowed to be used in the 'oDataV4Url' parameter of the 'create_ui5_app' tool, for example: 'localhost, example.com, sub.example.com'. Set to an empty string to allow any domains. For wildcard subdomains, prefix the domain with a dot: '.example.com'. This will match 'www.example.com' but not 'example.com'.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: UI5_MCP_SERVER_ALLOWED_ODATA_DOMAINS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Set to any value to disable structured content in the MCP server responses.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: UI5_MCP_SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_STRUCTURED_CONTENT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Set to any value to disable resources in the MCP server responses, see https://modelcontextprotocol.io/specification/2025-06-18/server/resource. This is useful for clients that do not support resources, see https://modelcontextprotocol.io/clients, such as Cursor or the Gemini CLI.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: UI5_MCP_SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESOURCES

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Internal log level (https://ui5.github.io/cli/stable/pages/Troubleshooting/#changing-the-log-level): 'silent', 'error', 'warn', 'info', 'perf', 'verbose' or 'silly'
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: UI5_LOG_LVL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Directory where the MCP server stores its data, such as cached API references.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.default: The '.ui5' directory in the user's home directory
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: UI5_DATA_DIR

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: VT_INSTANCE_BEARER_TOKEN

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Comma-separated list of tools to disable
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS

servers.name: io.github.VictoriaMetrics-Community/mcp-vmanomaly
servers.description: MCP Server for vmanomaly - VictoriaMetrics anomaly detection

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: vmanomaly server endpoint URL (e.g., http://localhost:8490)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: VMANOMALY_ENDPOINT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Bearer token for authenticating with vmanomaly API
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: VMANOMALY_BEARER_TOKEN

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Custom HTTP headers for vmanomaly requests (comma-separated key=value pairs, e.g., X-Custom-Header=value1,X-Another=value2)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: VMANOMALY_HEADERS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: MCP server mode: stdio (default), sse, or http
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_SERVER_MODE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Listen address for SSE/HTTP modes (default: localhost:8080)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_LISTEN_ADDR

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Log level: debug, info (default), warn, or error
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Log file path (empty = stderr)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_LOG_FILE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Comma-separated list of tools to disable
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Heartbeat interval for HTTP mode (default: 30s)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Disable embedded documentation resources
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_DISABLE_RESOURCES

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: RIGOL_RESOURCE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Communication timeout in milliseconds
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: VISA_TIMEOUT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Enable or disable oscilloscope beeper sounds
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: RIGOL_BEEPER_ENABLED

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Custom directory for temporary files (waveforms, screenshots). Required for Docker if you need to access captured data outside the container. Mount a volume to this path.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: RIGOL_TEMP_DIR

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image.sd] Stability.ai image generation API key
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_SD_KEY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image.pixAi] Optional: pixAi ModelId, if not set use default model 1648918127446573124
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_PIXAI_MODEL_ID

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Option: Generate image using ComfyUI API at specified URL. Example: http://192.168.1.100:8188
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_COMFY_URL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Path to API workflow file when using text to image with ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/t2i_sample.json
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_T2I

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Path of API workflow file when image to image in ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/i2i_sample.json
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_I2I

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Variable values to send to the workflow via comfyUI API
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_COMFY_PARAMS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image] Optional: Fixed avatar generation prompt. You will no longer be able to change your avatar during conversations.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_FIXED_MODEL_PROMPT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image area ratio. default 0.042
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_BODY_AREA_RATIO

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image aspect ratios. default 1.5~2.3
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_BODY_HW_RATIO

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window horizontal ratio. default 0.5
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_W

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window aspect ratio. default 0.75
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_H

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Sns.Bs] Bluesky sns registration address
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_BS_ID

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Sns.Bs] bluesky sns password
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_BS_PASS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Sns.Bs] bluesky sns handle name: e.g. xxxxxxxx.bsky.social
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_BS_HANDLE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [etc] Optional: Directly filter the tools to be used. All are available if not specified. e.g. tips,set_traveler_location
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_FILTER_TOOLS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [etc] Option: Specify whether the movement mode is 'realtime' or 'skip'. default realtime
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_MOVE_MODE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image] Option: Output image width (pixels) Default is 512
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_IMAGE_WIDTH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image] Options: 'true' = do not output image, not specified = output image if possible, default is not specified
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_NO_IMAGE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Image] Option: 'true' = Output StreetView image as is without avatar superimposition. Not specified = Superimpose avatar image. Default is not specified.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_NO_AVATAR

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Sns] Optional: Specify the feed tag when posting to SNS (#required, 15 characters or more) Default is #geo_less_traveler
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_FEED_TAG

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Streamable-http] Maximum number of sessions when using Streamable-http
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_MAX_SESSIONS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Streamable-http] Session TTL when using Streamable-http
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_SESSION_TTL_MS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: [Streamable-http] Service TTL when using Streamable-http
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MT_SERVICE_TTL_MS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Path to kubeconfig file; defaults to ~/.kube/config if unset.

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Logging level: 'error', 'warn', 'info' (default), or 'debug'.

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Kubernetes context name to use. If unset, uses the current context from kubeconfig.

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Skip TLS certificate verification for Kubernetes API (use 'true' or '1'). Not recommended for production.

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Enable global sensitive data masking. Set to 'true' or '1' to mask sensitive values in responses.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_HIDE_SENSITIVE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Default timeout in milliseconds for operations. If unset, uses plugin-specific defaults.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_TIMEOUT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Disable Kubernetes plugin. Set to 'true' or '1' to disable.

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Disable Argo Workflows plugin. Set to 'true' or '1' to disable.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_DISABLE_ARGO_PLUGIN

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Disable Argo CD plugin. Set to 'true' or '1' to disable.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MCP_DISABLE_ARGOCD_PLUGIN

servers.name: io.github.mongodb-js/mongodb
servers.description: MongoDB Model Context Protocol Server

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Atlas API client ID for authentication. Required for running Atlas tools.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_API_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Atlas API client secret for authentication. Required for running Atlas tools.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_API_CLIENT_SECRET

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Time in milliseconds that temporary database users created when connecting to MongoDB Atlas clusters will remain active before being automatically deleted.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_ATLAS_TEMPORARY_DATABASE_USER_LIFETIME_MS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: An array of tool names that require user confirmation before execution. Requires the client to support elicitation.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_CONFIRMATION_REQUIRED_TOOLS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: MongoDB connection string for direct database connections. Optional, if not set, you'll need to call the connect tool before interacting with MongoDB data.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_CONNECTION_STRING

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: When set to true, disables validation of embeddings dimensions.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_DISABLE_EMBEDDINGS_VALIDATION

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: An array of tool names, operation types, and/or categories of tools that will be disabled.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Time in milliseconds between export cleanup cycles that remove expired export files.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORT_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Time in milliseconds after which an export is considered expired and eligible for cleanup.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORT_TIMEOUT_MS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Folder to store exported data files.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_EXPORTS_PATH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Host address to bind the HTTP server to (only used when transport is 'http').
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_HTTP_HOST

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Port number for the HTTP server (only used when transport is 'http').
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_HTTP_PORT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Idle timeout for a client to disconnect (only applies to http transport).
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: When set to true, enforces that query operations must use an index, rejecting queries that perform a collection scan.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_INDEX_CHECK

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Folder to store logs.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_LOG_PATH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Comma separated values, possible values are 'mcp', 'disk' and 'stderr'.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_LOGGERS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: The maximum size in bytes for results from a find or aggregate tool call. This serves as an upper bound for the responseBytesLimit parameter in those tools.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_BYTES_PER_QUERY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: The maximum number of documents that can be returned by a find or aggregate tool call. For the find tool, the effective limit will be the smaller of this value and the tool's limit parameter.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_DOCUMENTS_PER_QUERY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Notification timeout for a client to be aware of disconnect (only applies to http transport).
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_NOTIFICATION_TIMEOUT_MS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: When set to true, only allows read, connect, and metadata operation types, disabling create/update/delete operations.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_READ_ONLY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: When set to disabled, disables telemetry collection.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_TELEMETRY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Either 'stdio' or 'http'.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_TRANSPORT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: API key for Voyage AI embeddings service (required for vector search operations with text-to-embedding conversion).
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_VOYAGE_API_KEY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_LOG_PATH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Comma separated values of logger types.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_LOGGERS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: The maximum size in bytes for results from a find or aggregate tool call. This serves as an upper bound for the responseBytesLimit parameter in those tools.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_BYTES_PER_QUERY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: The maximum number of documents that can be returned by a find or aggregate tool call. For the find tool, the effective limit will be the smaller of this value and the tool's limit parameter.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_MAX_DOCUMENTS_PER_QUERY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Notification timeout for a client to be aware of disconnect (only applies to http transport).
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_NOTIFICATION_TIMEOUT_MS

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Comma separated values of preview features that are enabled.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_PREVIEW_FEATURES

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: When set to true, only allows read, connect, and metadata operation types, disabling create/update/delete operations.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_READ_ONLY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: When set to disabled, disables telemetry collection.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_TELEMETRY

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Either 'stdio' or 'http'.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MDB_MCP_TRANSPORT

servers.name: io.github.schemacrawler/schemacrawler-ai
servers.description: Enables natural language schema queries — explore tables, keys, procedures, and get SQL help fast

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database user name. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_USER

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database user password. Can be optional depending on the database connection type.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE_PASSWORD

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: JDBC URL for database connection. If this is provided, the server, host, port and database are not used.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_JDBC_URL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: SchemaCrawler database plugin, for example, 'sqlserver' or 'sqlite'. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_SERVER

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database host. Defaults to localhost. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_HOST

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database port. Defaults to the default port for the server type. Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_PORT

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Database to connect to (optional). Used only if the JDBC URL is not provided.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_DATABASE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: How much database metadata to retrieve. Values are 'minimum', 'standard', 'detailed' or 'maximum'.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_INFO_LEVEL

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Logging verbosity level. Values are 'SEVERE', 'WARNING', 'INFO', 'CONFIG', or 'FINE'.
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: SCHCRWLR_LOG_LEVEL

servers.name: io.github.shinpr/mcp-local-rag
servers.description: Easy-to-setup local RAG server with minimal configuration

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Base directory for document storage (defaults to current working directory)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: BASE_DIR

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Path to LanceDB database directory (defaults to ./lancedb/)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: DB_PATH

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Directory where Transformers.js models are cached (defaults to ./models/)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CACHE_DIR

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Embedding model name (defaults to Xenova/all-MiniLM-L6-v2)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MODEL_NAME

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Maximum file size in bytes (defaults to 104857600 / 100MB)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: MAX_FILE_SIZE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Text chunk size for splitting documents (defaults to 512)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CHUNK_SIZE

environmentVariablesJsonSchema.description: Overlap between consecutive chunks (defaults to 100)
environmentVariablesJsonSchema.name: CHUNK_OVERLAP
